Due to the biomarker assessments and non-enzymatic variables were taken over time, a repeated measures analysis can be performed.

**Required libraries**

```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(ggplot2)
```

Call the data

```{r}
library(readxl)
df <- read_excel("DATA/tomato-clean.xlsx", sheet = 3)
```

## H~2~O~2~

### Statistical analysis

Fit the mixed-effects model

```{r}
model <- lmer(H202 ~ Day * Treatment + (1 | Block), data = df)
summary(model)
```
